Services.name: Analyse test coverage and quality
Services.text: Test code coverage is only part of the analysis. The quality of that coverage should also be analysed. Incidental coverage can lead to hidden bugs.

Services.name: Flakey tests
Services.text: Sometimes even the best programmers write flakey tests. The rarer the occurance that the test is inconclusive for even fails for no apparent reason the harder it is to debug.

Services.name: Code quality reports
Services.text: Code quality reports should be published regularly. Everyone on the team needs to use the same rules for that analysis in their workspace.

Services.name: Workspace scripts and tools
Services.text: Anything to help a developer do his or her job. We write scripts to help keep your workspace clean and other day-to-day development operations.

Services.name: Load testing
Services.text: Load tests put your application under stress to exaggerate inefficiencies. When we do this, any small indiscernible inefficiencies will become larger. Until they are obvious to you and then you can start to fix them.

Services.name: Funtions-as-a-service
Services.text: We host Warewolf servers of different types and sizes. These servers host Warewolf workflows. Each workflow is a function hosted by Warewolf for running website or app servers.
